parameters.name: SuppressionState
parameters.description: Component suppression state as defined in swComponentSuppressionState_e (see Remarks )

parameters.name: ConfigOption
parameters.description: Configuration option as defined in swInConfigurationOpts_e

parameters.name: WhichConfig
parameters.description: Name of the configuration to change

parameters.name: SaveClosedDocs
parameters.description: True saves closed documents, false does not

title: IAssemblyDoc.SetComponentState
description: Sets the suppression state for the specified components.
signature:
System.Boolean SetComponentState( 
   System.Int32
SuppressionState
,
   System.Object
CompArr
,
   System.Int32
ConfigOption
,
   System.String
WhichConfig
,
   System.Boolean
SaveClosedDocs
)

parameters.name: SuppressionState
parameters.description: Component suppression state as defined in swComponentSuppressionState_e (see Remarks )

parameters.name: ConfigOption
parameters.description: Configuration option as defined in swInConfigurationOpts_e

parameters.name: WhichConfig
parameters.description: Name of the configuration to change

parameters.name: SaveClosedDocs
parameters.description: True saves closed documents, false does not

returns: True if the components were changed, false if not
remarks:
You cannot set a component to lightweight using this method. Instead, use
IComponent::SetSuppression2
.
